description: These kaomojis are facing forward and waving. Use one of these waving Japanese emoticons if you want to wave hello to somebody that you know. Add in some fancy words like “hello” to make it the ultimate greeting emoticon. It is always nice to be met with a super smiley and waving emote! ヾ(*･ω･*)o ◦°˚(´•̛ᴗ•̛`)/˚°◦ ヽ(´･ω･`)､ ◞(⚭⃚⃙͐·̫⚭⃚⃙͐)˩✧ └╏ ･ ᗜ ･ ╏┐ ヽ། ﹒ ~ ﹒ །╮ ｰ<(´∀｀)/ (ﾉ´∀｀*)ﾉ
title: Waving Forward
